comments.body: Sample output would help tremendously here, so users can compare their output to the sample output and more easily find the `label` and `privilege` entries we're talking about here and below.

comments.body: Since 2.5 is the oldest supported release, should we remove this section now?
Makes sense, the docs for this are complicated enough without the version differences.
